DOC.brief_summary: The overall purpose research ass whether `` 60 second Brain Game '' `` Brain Speed Test '' computer-based program use assessment tool objectively define severity functional impact tinnitus .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study aim assess deficit brain processing speed attention ( two cognitive domain whose deficit implicate tinnitus ) use `` Brain Speed Test '' .
DOC.criteria: Participants must age 18 80 . Participants must subjective , unilateral bilateral , nonpulsatile tinnitus 6months duration longer . Participants must able read , write speak use English language . Participants must able provide inform consent . Participants tinnitus related Workman 's Compensation Claim litigationrelated situation . Participants active diagnosis acute chronic brainrelated neurological condition alter normal brain anatomy function include Parkinson 's disease , Multiple Sclerosis , Alzheimer 's Disease , cerebral infarct , traumatic brain injury , history brain tumor ( ) , epilepsy , dementia . Participants tinnitus relate retrocochlear lesion , cochlear implant , know anatomic/structural lesion brain , skullbase , temporal bone ear . Participants unable hear high volume computerbased objective assessment . Any medication may affect alter cognition include limited sedative , hypnotic , narcotic , opiate . Any medical condition PI determines would compromise safety participant complicate interpretation study result .
